title: Major sponsor drops deal with Australian cricket team
text:
Major sponsor drops deal with Australian cricket team 10:41am BST - 01:33 
A major sponsor of the Australian cricket team has cancelled its three year deal after less than a year, following a ball tampering scandal at the third test against South Africa and sanctions against three major Australian players. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
